instance_template: cpu("BoltX"; "HydraPro"; "LiteCore"). watt("BoltX", 85; "HydraPro", 125; "LiteCore", 60). cost("BoltX", 400; "HydraPro", 550; "LiteCore", 350). gpu("StormZ"; "Nebula9"; "VegaLite"). watt("StormZ", 180; "Nebula9", 150; "VegaLite", 95). cost("StormZ", 800; "Nebula9", 650; "VegaLite", 500). psu("PowerMax750"; "Eco600"; "Titan900"). capacity("PowerMax750", 750; "Eco600", 600; "Titan900", 900). cost("PowerMax750", 200; "Eco600", 150; "Titan900", 250).
generator: 1 { selected_cpu(C) : cpu(C) } 1. 1 { selected_gpu(G) : gpu(G) } 1. 1 { selected_psu(P) : psu(P) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: Total CPU and GPU wattage 100W below PSU capacity.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: selected_total_draw(D) :- selected_cpu(C), selected_gpu(G), watt(C, WC), watt(G, WG), D = WC + WG. :- selected_psu(P), selected_total_draw(D), capacity(P, CP), D > CP - 100.

hard_constraints.description: Highest wattage part must be highest cost part.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: selected(X) :- selected_cpu(X). selected(X) :- selected_gpu(X). selected(X) :- selected_psu(X). max_watt(X) :- watt(X, W), W = #max {W1 : selected(Y), watt(Y, W1)}. max_cost(X) :- cost(X, C), C = #max {C1 : selected(Y), cost(Y, C1)}. :- selected(X), max_watt(X), not max_cost(X).

hard_constraints.description: HydraPro incompatible with VegaLite. Eco600 incompatible with StormZ.
Forbidden selection: all three cheapest components.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: cheapest_cpu(C) :- cpu(C), cost(C, V), V = #min {V1 : cpu(C1), cost(C1, V1)}. cheapest_gpu(G) :- gpu(G), cost(G, V), V = #min {V1 : gpu(G1), cost(G1, V1)}. cheapest_psu(P) :- psu(P), cost(P, V), V = #min {V1 : psu(P1), cost(P1, V1)}. :- selected_cpu(C), cheapest_cpu(C), selected_gpu(G), cheapest_gpu(G), selected_psu(P), cheapest_psu(P).

hard_constraints.description: Cost difference between any two parts maximum $400.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected(X), selected(Y), cost(X, CX), cost(Y, CY), CX - CY > 400. :- selected(X), selected(Y), cost(Y, CY), cost(X, CX), CY - CX > 400.
